text: Louis Greaves Armitage (15 December 1921 – 2000) was an English professional footballer who played as an inside forward. ==References== Category:1921 births Category:2000 deaths Category:People from Kingston upon Hull Category:English footballers Category:Association football inside forwards Category:Rotherham United F.C. players Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Louis Armitage
